name: Kobold
description: Kobolds are small, reptilian humanoids known for their cunning and cowardice. They are often found in subterranean lairs, where they dig extensive tunnels and set elaborate traps. Despite their small size and weakness, kobolds are resourceful and clever, often using their numbers and traps to their advantage. They have a strong connection to dragons, seeing them as kin.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and Draconic.
special: Pack Tactics: You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isnâ€™t incapacitated.
